name: Super Poop
description:
In created a small surprise strikes the divine lightning, which breathed life into a little lump, and then a little surprise realizes that there is no life without a home unless he builds a house...

But to build a house is not so easy, you have to go through 7 divine tests in search of materials on the way to a happy dream in building a house...


►Cheerful soundtrack ...
►Incredible difficult gameplay ...
►An unusual story ...
►Humor...
